website_summaries.verdict: This waterproof mascara combines the benefits of Clinique's High Impact Mascara with a waterproof formula, making it the best choice for a mascara with staying power.
pros: Most wearers rave about how well this mascara wears, even when exposed to moisture
A deeply pigmented black that makes lashes look longer and thicker
Not too difficult to remove when you use an oil-based makeup remover
cons: Too much mascara comes out on the brush, which is messy
Tends to weigh down straight lashes

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried dozens of waterproof mascara's from expensive to cheap. None are smooth in texture and non clumpy like Clinique's. You can build up your lashes if you want drama or use a little for a suttle look. I cant stand clumps and I will not use mascara if it clumps. This does not. The brush is fine bristle and the mascara itself is of a smooth texture.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Product not labeled correctly
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst mascara ever. It clumps SO bad and looks terrible. I missed the return window by 3 days. I’m so dissatisfied! I cannot recommend this product. It does not say in the description that this is high impact “curling” mascara. I would not have purchased it if I knew it was “curling” mascara. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: geojen

customer_reviews.title: Clumps badly
customer_reviews.text: This mascara clumps very bad. Also irritated my eyes so bad the entire day that I wore it, from all the clumping
customer_reviews.author: Hannavas

customer_reviews.title: That it doesn’t smudge in the heat .
customer_reviews.text: Love the mascara. Use it on my lashes everyday.. It doesn’t smudge , lashes look great all in Florida Heat .
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof mascara lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof and smudge proof mascara that lasts all day! Easy to apply. Comes off easily with makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The only mascara I can use that doesn't end up making me look like a raccoon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. I have oily skin and it doesn’t rub off on my eyelids through the day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Webb

customer_reviews.title: Bring Makeup Counter to Me
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I get at the makeup counter at Macy's. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: SuzAnne

customer_reviews.title: Nice mascara my daughter keeps borrowing it!
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara although I prefer the waterproof curling mascara which apparently they discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: chanda palcher

customer_reviews.title: It's waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Took the mascara on a Mexican vacation where I swam and played in the ocean. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: cmv

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty well dried out and clumped in container. Pretty disappointed as Clinique products are usually great. Did attempt to apply, and was very difficult to remove
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it was all crumbly and much fell out upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was for a gift, person lived the product because it works great in damp weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Avid Users

customer_reviews.title: best I've found, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found a waterproof that doesn't crumble - this is the best so far. I'll keep looking because it's gotten even more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof for the day
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of problems with mascara running. This is no exception. By the end of the day it is under my eyes. I gave it a 2 because when first applied it looks great
customer_reviews.author: jennifer stevens

customer_reviews.title: Best durable and resistant mascara out there.
customer_reviews.text: With the blackest black and the most waterproof mascara out there, I've been using this mascara for many years.
customer_reviews.author: LOURDES SUAREZ

customer_reviews.title: True Product
customer_reviews.text: Love Clinique, product comes in original packaging. I prefer waterproof, but regular version is also amazing though
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Follett

customer_reviews.title: It stays on!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this mascara would be removed with warm water like other Clinique water proof mascara. I had to purchase some mascara remover and then it came off easily. So, in one regard it was good, it had staying power! I like the full brush for application.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Product tampered with?
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived without carton. Was it tampered with? I used it once and had allegic reaction. Tried a second time, allergic reaction. I have used this exact item for over 30 yrs with no problem. Attempted to return item, not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: My sister shops at Sephora and receives quite a few samples of which this product was one. I love it. I wear it daily and my lashes look great and noticeable. Doesn't run or burn. I use make up remover first then wash. Doesn't come off easily.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN T BACCHUS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for a waterproof = it washes off easier than most others without too much effort.
customer_reviews.author: CDH

product_meta.title: Clinique High Impact Waterproof Mascara - # 01 Black - 8ml/0.28oz
product_meta.description: Boasts a waterproof, non-flaking, non-clumping, non-smudging formula Adds instant volume & length to every single lash Provides pure, deep colour that imparts high impact to the eyes Creates a lusher, plusher & bolder eye look Ophthalmologist-
feature_bullets: Clinique - Mascara - High Impact Waterproof Mascara
